alert.note: Alert for Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 3:54PM EDT until September 21 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Orange County in east central Florida... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 354 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pine Castle, or over Orlando, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Orlando, Orlando International Airport, Azalea Park, Conway, and Oak Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
